original_text: And the officials were enraged at Jeremiah, and they beat him and imprisoned him in the house of Jonathan the secretary, for it had been made a prison.
korean_text: 고관들이 노여워하여 예레미야를 때려서 서기관 요나단의 집에 가두었으니 이는 그들이 이 집을 옥으로 삼았음이더라

sentences.original_text: And the officials were enraged at Jeremiah
and imprisoned him in the house of Jonathan the secretary
for it had been made a prison
